00057 class iclient_persistence

00060

00062 
00064     static int persistence_open(void** handle, char* clientID, char* serverURI, void* context);
00065     static int persistence_close(void* handle); 
00066     static int persistence_put(void* handle, char* key, int bufcount, char* buffers[], int buflens[]);
00067     static int persistence_get(void* handle, char* key, char** buffer, int* buflen);
00068     static int persistence_remove(void* handle, char* key);
00069     static int persistence_keys(void* handle, char*** keys, int* nkeys);
00070     static int persistence_clear(void* handle);

00072 
00073 public:
00077     typedef std::shared_ptr<iclient_persistence> ptr_t;
00081     virtual ~iclient_persistence() {}

00089     virtual void close() =0;
00093     virtual void clear() =0;
00099     virtual bool contains_key(const std::string& key) =0;

00121 };
